column5: Has anyone ever took some Applepie in?Would I pay duty on the 1 liter thats in it or pay for 8-9 qrts.that it makes?Or...... should I not say a thing?
You will pay for whatever size bottle it is in. If you are bringing alot of it just bring the ingredients and pay duty on the alcohol and combine them in Canada.
Over 1.14 liters of liquor you will have to pay duty.

Yes we did. We just poured it back into the apple juice/cider jugs we used to make it and loaded it with our groceries and no one even asked a thing about it just looked like normal apple juice. We were younger and took more risks back then lol!
It must have been a long day and i'm tired,never thought about making it up there,or putting it back into cider/juice jugs
